properties.description: Monday 12pm-4pm, Tuesday 11am-2.30pm & Thursday 12am - 4pm.Bellfarm Social Hall offers a warm space with free tea, coffee, biscuits, soups, books and chat. We also offer a foodbank daily. No vouchers or referals are needed. We are not area specific. It doesnt matter where you come from you are welcome.

properties.title: Bellfarm Social Hall

properties.description: When: Monday to Wednesday, 10.00am - 2.00pm Fancy a cuppa? Fancy a chat? Or a place to just relax in the warm? Come and join us in our living room! Everyone is welcome and we can't wait to meet you!Free tea and coffee is available to all - as well as clothes and fresh fruit and veg to take home. Every Monday we restock our food stall and have tinned goods available as well. All completely free!Donations (of goods and money) are welcome.

properties.description: When: Tuesdays 10.30 - 12.30Join us from 10:30am every Tuesday in the Oak Tree Room at Oaken Grove Community Centre, where we open the partition between the cafe and the Oak Tree Room and have board games available for everyone to use.Enjoy a small hot drink and a cake from the Reading Cafe for £3.50.Hot food and refreshments will be available through the reading café. No purchase necessary. For more information email info@hwyca.co.uk or ring 01904 769176. Everyone welcome!

properties.title: Pop Inn Warm Welcome

properties.description: When: Monday, Wednesday and Friday afternoons between 1pm and 3pmPlaces of Welcome Drop InA community drop in, every Monday, Wednesday and Friday between 1pm and 3pm. Free tea, coffee, cakes and biscuits. Places of Welcome are a growing network of local community groups providing their neighbourhoods with places where all people feel safe to belong, connect and contribute.
